name: Historic Tie Drives
functionStatement: Streambed material and bedforms provide habitat and influence stability; appropriate substrate sizes and heterogeneity support aquatic communities.
descriptionMarkdown: Screening metric used to evaluate Bed composition and bedform dynamics based on the definition and bin thresholds provided for this metric.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Use available GIS layers/imagery and/or a field screening (as applicable) to quantify or rate the metric according to the provided bin thresholds.

levels.label: Marginal
